description: a(d-2) is the smallest member of A046076 containing an undulating sequence of 010... or 101... of maximal length d=3, 4, ...
references: C. A. Pickover, ``The Undulation of the Monks.'' Ch. 20 in Keys to Infinity. New York: W.H.Freeman, pp. 159-161 1995.
C. A. Pickover, "Wonders of Numbers", Oxford New York 2001, Chapter 52, pp. 123-124, 316-317.
links: C. A. Pickover, "Wonders of Numbers, Adventures in Mathematics, Mind and Meaning," Zentralblatt review
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Undulating Number.
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
